headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Sunday Drivers Week: Double GTA$ & RP Racing Playlist & Tee unlock (Sept 2 - 8)
content:
Earn Double GTA$ & RP in a special, Muscle car racing Playlist now through Thursday, September 8th.

And bounce around town as a human billboard with the Bahama Mamas Tee, which you've unlocked just by logging on and can be found in the Special Items in your Wardrobe!

Check out rockstargames.com/newswire for all the details.
